A

addRandom(Animal) - Method in class River
Attempts to add a new animal of age 0 and of random gender, who is the same type as the specified animal to a random empty cell.

Models an animal in the river ecosystem.

toString() - Method in class Animal
Renders this animal as a String value of the form TGA, where T is type (fish = F, bear = B), G is gender, and A is age.
toString() - Method in class River
Produces a string representation of the river, using "---" to represent empty cells and Animal.toString() for animals.

Updates one specific cell of the river.
updateRiver() - Method in class River
Performs one cycle of the simulation by calling River.updateCell(int) on every cell in the river array.
